title: Flower of Frost
summaries: The Flower of Frost is a Hardmode magic weapon that launches a slow, non-piercing Ball of Frost that ricochets up to seven times (but not off of platforms), dissipating on the eighth. Balls of Frost inflict the (Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) Frostbite / (Old-gen console and 3DS versions) Frostburn debuff upon damaging an enemy for 5â€“14 seconds. The Flower of Frost has a 19/60 (31.67%) chance to be dropped by Ice Mimics in the Ice biome.
